page.title: 10Playground Games
page.content: Lizzie I like to play{horses.} Normally two people play. You need two people to play because the person who touches the wall first is the winner and the other loses. It is like a race. I like horses. Paul I play{cars}and I play{bulldogs.} Some one is on it and you have to run across the playground without being had. I play with my friends at play time. Emma and Anthea We play{hopscotch.} You need a stone to play with and you throw it. You have to hop. You need about four or five people to play with.
